lines.english: Thart agus thart
lines.irish: Thart agus thart

lines.english: Big skins, thíos ag an mini mart
lines.irish: Páipéir mhóra rollta, down at the mini mart

lines.english: Few loose Capri Sun and a Mars Bar
lines.irish: Cúpla Capri Sun scaoilte agus barra Mars

lines.english: Dúid mhór salach ansin tá mé thar barr
lines.irish: Big dirty joint and now I'm grand

lines.english: Thart agus thart
lines.irish: Round and round

lines.english: Cosúil le mo mhéilteoir ya
lines.irish: Like my grinder, yeah

lines.english: Fear beag gnaitheach when I'm on tour
lines.irish: Busy little man when I'm on tour

lines.english: No top, moshpit, sweaty balls, encore
lines.irish: Gan léine, i lár an moshpit, liathróidí luiscthe, encore

lines.english: Lá eile cac céanna
lines.irish: Another day, same shit

lines.english: 'Dom an stuif, cuirfidh mé ceann le chéile
lines.irish: Give me the stuff, I'll roll one

lines.english: Móglaí an tógalaí fáilte chuig an bráinse is úra glas de na hóglaigh
lines.irish: Móglaí the builder, welcome to the freshest green branch of the volunteers

lines.english: Ceithre uair is fichid
lines.irish: Twenty-four (24)

lines.english: Cead rud ar maidin agus mall in san oíche
lines.irish: One thing in the morning, and late into the night

lines.english: Fuck all else le bheith déanamh thart anseo
lines.irish: Fuck all else to be at around here

lines.english: Anois ar ais chuig an siopa to get a pack of raws
lines.irish: Now back to the shop to get some rolling papers

lines.english: Caught in a loop like I'm tryna read a book but it's the same page over and over and over and over and over and over
lines.irish: Gafa i lúb, ag léamh an leabhair céanna arís is arís eile

lines.english: Caught in the loop like I'm tryna read a book but it's the same page over and over and over and over and over and over
lines.irish: Gafa i lúb, ag léamh an leabhair chéanna arís is arís eile

lines.english: Ah fuck I'll just watch a movie
lines.irish: Ah fuck é, féachfaidh mé ar scannán

lines.english: Gafa sa loop, groundhog day point two
lines.irish: Stuck in a loop, Groundhog Day 2.0

lines.english: It's been too long, I need an encore and sweaty balls too
lines.irish: Tá sé rófhada, tá encore agus liathróidí allasacha de dhíth orm

lines.english: Gafa sa loop, nothin' to do
lines.irish: Stuck in a loop, níl faic le déanamh

lines.english: It's been too long, I need an encore and sweaty balls too
lines.irish: Tá sé rófhada, tá encore agus liathróidí allasacha de dhíth orm

lines.english: Why? What are we gonna do tomorrow night?
lines.irish: Cén fáth? Cad a dhéanfaidh muid oíche amárach?

lines.english: The same thing we do every night, Pinky. Try to take—
lines.irish: An rud céanna a dhéanaimid gach oíche, Pinky. Déan iarracht glacadh—

lines.english: Drugs
lines.irish: Drugaí

lines.english: I miss love buzz hugs 'is ag ól mo chuid le festival thugs
lines.irish: I miss the hugs and drinking my share with festival thugs

lines.english: I mo mucked up guds, ag suppáil suds le random cunts
lines.irish: In my wrecked guts, neckin' pints with random lads

lines.english: Ach i rith an amá, dhá harp déag agus mála Maradonna
lines.irish: But during the day, twelve Harps and a Maradona bag

lines.english: And I wanna get a half or a q then I laugh at the news as the madness ensues, tá mé gafa sa loop
lines.irish: And I want a half or a quarter, laugh at the news as madness erupts, I'm stuck in the loop

lines.english: Gafa sa loop, groundhog day point two
lines.irish: Gafa sa lúb, Groundhog Day 2.0

lines.english: It's been too long, I need an encore and sweaty balls too
lines.irish: Tá sé rófhada, tá encore agus liathróidí allasacha de dhíth orm
